title.abbrev: Two-Tier Address Structure for the Internet

front.title: A Two-Tier Address Structure for the Internet: A Solution to the Problem of Address Space Exhaustion

author.organization: University College London, Dept. of Computer Science
University College London, Dept. of Computer Science

abstract.t: This RFC presents a solution to problem of address space exhaustion in the Internet. It proposes a two-tier address structure for the Internet. This is an "idea" paper and discussion is strongly encouraged.
